TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITestCaseProvider

Docs.summary: The ITestCaseProvider interface is used by extensions that provide data for parameterized tests, along with certain flags and other indicators used in the test.

Docs.summary: Return an IEnumerable providing test cases for use in running a paramterized test.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool HasTestCasesFor(class System.Reflection.MethodInfo method) cil managed

Docs.param: A MethodInfo representing a parameterized test
Docs.summary: Determine whether any test cases are available for a parameterized method.
Docs.returns: True if any cases are available, otherwise false.
